name: Naruto Powerful Shippuden [3DS]
description:
JOIN NARUTO & ROCK LEE IN TWO FUN ADVENTURES!
A whole new side-scrolling NARUTO game developed exclusively for the Nintendo 3DS™ focused on cutesy presentation, comical character style and easy to pick-up-and-play gameplay for fans of all ages.

Two different stories
Play as either Naruto or Rock Lee and enjoy missions taken directly from their animated storylines

Two different gameplay modes
Story Mode & Endless Battle mode included

Anime inspired presentation
Comical graphics with humorous on-screen expressions and actions

Action-packed gameplay
Earn experience points to power up your characters, call-in support characters during battles or use the touch screen to strengthen special attacks

QR code feature
Scan special QR codes designed for the game and gain access to other bonuses
